allOf.description: A contributor to the content of a knowledge asset, including authors, editors, reviewers, and endorsers.

___name.description: The name of the individual or organization responsible for the contribution.

___contact.description: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the contributor.

allOf.description: Specifies contact information for a person or organization.

___name.description: The name of an individual to contact.
